name: Wild Lasers
description:
Jupiter has crash landed on a dangerous planet and needs to escape the cave with the help of his trusty laser rifle

Click to shoot and A and D to run left and right

Spring Wildcard 2022

Team Lead & Artist: Alexandra Ramirez

Producer: Emily Chavez

Game Designers: Kevin, Aidan

Programmers: Calli, Rose, Skylar Lee-Stefanov

Writers: Christopher Soong, Rahul Sharma
